sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Lavoro Limited Receives Nasdaq Notice of Non-Compliance Due to Delayed Form 20-F Filing
feed.summary: Lavoro Limited received a notice of non-compliance from Nasdaq due to the delayed filing of its Form 20-F for the fiscal year ending June 30, 2025. This notice does not immediately affect the listing of its securities but requires Lavoro to submit a compliance plan by November 28, 2025. The delay stems from complexities related to its EJ Plan introduced in June 2025, and Nasdaq has granted a previous extension for another filing, with any further compliance extension limited to 180 days.
